fields.name: Availability
fields.description: Properties describing how the cloud is distributed across availability zones

fields.name: Encryption
fields.description: Customer managed key encryption, can be enabled or disabled

fields.name: ExternalCloudLinks
fields.description: Array of cloud link IDs from other clouds that connect to this one

fields.name: IdentitySources
fields.description: vCenter Single Sign On Identity Sources

fields.name: Internet
fields.description: Connectivity to internet is enabled or disabled

fields.name: ManagementCluster
fields.description: The default cluster used for management

fields.name: ManagementNetwork
fields.description: Network used to access vCenter Server and NSX-T Manager

fields.name: NetworkBlock
fields.description: The block of addresses should be unique across VNet in your subscription as well as on-premise. Make sure the CIDR format is conformed to (A.B.C.D/X) where A,B,C,D are between 0 and 255, and X is between 0 and 22

fields.name: NsxPublicIPQuotaRaised
fields.description: Flag to indicate whether the private cloud has the quota for provisioned NSX Public IP count raised from 64 to 1024

fields.name: NsxtCertificateThumbprint
fields.description: Thumbprint of the NSX-T Manager SSL certificate

fields.name: NsxtPassword
fields.description: Optionally, set the NSX-T Manager password when the private cloud is created

fields.name: ProvisioningNetwork
fields.description: Used for virtual machine cold migration, cloning, and snapshot migration

fields.name: SecondaryCircuit
fields.description: A secondary expressRoute circuit from a separate AZ. Only present in a stretched private cloud

fields.name: VMotionNetwork
fields.description: Used for live migration of virtual machines

fields.name: VcenterCertificateThumbprint
fields.description: Thumbprint of the vCenter Server SSL certificate

fields.name: VcenterPassword
fields.description: Optionally, set the vCenter admin password when the private cloud is created
